title: Ticket #2350: condor_submit does sloppy checks for attribute references
description: condor_submit checks for references to various attributes such as FileSystemDomain, Memory, and Disk. It does this by looking for the attribute names in the unparsed string representing the requirements expression. This means it can incorrectly think that there are references when in fact the attribute name just happens to appear within a different attribute name or in a string literal.
